diagrams.code:
direction right
// Title
title Grokking Phenomenon in Transformers

// Nodes and groups
Training Start [shape: oval, color: lightgrey]

Memorization Phase [color: red, icon: book] {
  Fit to training data [shape: rectangle, color: red]
  High training accuracy [shape: rectangle, color: red]
  Low test accuracy [shape: rectangle, color: red]
}

Performance Curves [color: blue, icon: bar-chart] {
  Training accuracy rising [shape: rectangle, color: blue]
  Test accuracy plateau [shape: rectangle, color: blue]
}

Grokking Onset [shape: diamond, color: purple]

Generalization Phase [color: green, icon: rocket] {
  Rule abstraction [shape: rectangle, color: green]
  Test accuracy rise [shape: rectangle, color: green]
  Training accuracy remains high [shape: rectangle, color: green]
}

Mechanism Insight [color: lightgreen, icon: bulb] {
  Circuit formation [shape: rectangle, color: lightgreen]
  Weight sparsity increase [shape: rectangle, color: lightgreen]
}

Observation End [shape: oval, color: lightgrey]

// Relationships
Training Start > Fit to training data
Fit to training data > High training accuracy
High training accuracy > Low test accuracy
Low test accuracy > Training accuracy rising
Training accuracy rising > Test accuracy plateau
Test accuracy plateau > Grokking Onset: Sudden shift [color: purple]
Grokking Onset > Rule abstraction
Rule abstraction > Test accuracy rise
Test accuracy rise > Training accuracy remains high
Training accuracy remains high > Circuit formation
Circuit formation > Weight sparsity increase
Weight sparsity increase > Observation End
